Reference

Package

netCoin-package

The netCoin package.

Coincidence analysis

To run a coincience analysis

allNet()

Networked coincidences from incidences data.

barCoin()

Networked coincidences.

coin()

Coincidence matrix.

glmCoin()

Regression Graphs

gridGallery()

Images in a grid gallery.

netCoin()

Networked coincidences.

netCorr()

Networked correlations.

pathCoin()

Structural Equation Models Graphs.

surCoin()

Networked coincidences from a data frame.

surScat()

Networked coincidences from a data frame.

timeCoin()

Networked coincidences.

Utilities

Auxiliary functions

asNodes()

Nodes data frame.

coocur()

Coocurrence matrix.

dichotomize()

Dichotomize.

distant()

Distance matrix.

edgeList()

Edge list.

expectedList()

Expected list.

fromIgraph()

Produce interactive networks from igraph objects.

incTime()

Time incidences.

layoutCircle()

Produce a circle layout of any number of nodes.

layoutGrid()

Produce a layout of any number of nodes.

lower()

Similarity/distance matrix display.

mobileEdges()

Mobile Edges.

multigraphCreate()

Produce interactive multi graphs.

propCoin()

Express Coin Entries as Fraction of Marginal Table

savePajek()

Save a netCoin object as a .net (.paj) file to be read in Pajek, Gephi, ...

saveGhml()

Save a netCoin object as a .graphml file to be read in Gephi, Pajek, ...

shinyCoin()

Include netCoin Plots in Shiny.

sim()

Similarity matrix.

toIgraph()

igraph object.

Sample data

Galapagos

Data: Finches' presence in Galapagos Islands.

dice

Data: Roll a die (100 times).

events

Data: Attributes of the dice events.

ess

Data: European Social Survey, Round-8.

families

Data: Italian families in the Renaissance.

finches

Data: Finches'attributes in Galapagos islands.

links

Data: Links between Italian families in the Renaissance.

sociologists

Data: Sociologists born in the 19th century.
